divs: Sighting DetailsWent outside to have a smoke and as soon as i sat down a large green fireball streaked through the sky from the west torwards the north. At first i assumed it was a meteor or small asteroid but there are currently multiple police helicopters and military aircraft storming the area as i type this. They are approx. 8-10 mi. north of my location. If anyone else seen this and happen to have an allsky camera, please post the video. Going back outside to see if anything else happens.
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Casa Grande
There were no other sightings in Casa Grande on or around June 4th 2010
